en.name: Pale Flame
en.4p: When an Elemental Skill hits an opponent, ATK is increased by 9% for 7s. This effect stacks up to 2 times and can be triggered once every 0.3s. Once 2 stacks are reached, the 2-set effect is increased by 100%.

zh.name: 苍白之火
zh.4p: 元素战技命中敌人后，攻击力提升9%。该效果持续7秒，至多叠加2层，每0.3秒至多触发一次。叠满2层时，2件套的效果提升100%。
